sense.gloss: to fit (e.g. a pane into a frame), to insert (e.g. a cork), to fasten (a button)
to put on (something that envelops; e.g. a ring, gloves), to place (a hoop) around, to attach (e.g. a hose to a tap)
to pigeonhole (into a particular category), to force (into a mold), to place (restrictions) on
to entrap, to take (someone) in, to set (someone) up, to deceive

sdata.j: この↑場合↑↓ばあい↓、この↑理論↑↓りろん↓をあて|はめる|ことはできません。
sdata.e: You can't apply this theory to this case.

sdata.j: この↑規則↑↓きそく↓は↑貴方↑↓あなた↓には↑当↑↓あ↓て|はめる|ことはできない。
sdata.e: This rule cannot be applied to you.

sdata.j: トムはいつもシートベルトを|はめる|。
この↑規則↑↓きそく↓を↑全↑↓すべ↓てのケースに↑当↑↓あ↓て|はめる|ことはできません。
sdata.e: You can't apply this rule to every case.

sdata.j: トムは↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓↑指輪↑↓ゆびわ↓を|はめる|の？
sdata.e: Does Tom wear a wedding ring?
